articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE-Trump's media deal partner nears $50 million financing -sources
articles.description: DWAC had disclosed last month it was raising $50 million in convertible notes after cancelling a $1 billion private-investment-in-public-equity (PIPE) transaction. DWAC agreed to merge with TMTG in October 2021 but failed to complete the deal by a September 2022 deadline, as U.S. financial regulators scrutinized DWAC's disclosures to investors.
